TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MenuItem extends System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedItemsControl implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource
Public Class MenuItem Inherits HeaderedItemsControl Implements ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示 内某个可选择的项。

span.span: Represents a selectable item inside a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着其标头和对象的集合可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. A才能有子菜单。A can have submenus. 子菜单中的对象组成的。The submenu of the is made up of the objects within the of a . 很常见的以包含其他对象以创建嵌套子菜单。It is common for a to contain other objects to create nested submenus. A可以具有多个函数之一：A can have one of several functions: - 可以选择它来调用命令。It can be selected to invoke a command. - 它可以是其他菜单项的分隔符。It can be a separator for other menu items. - 它可以是子菜单的标头。It can be a header for a submenu. - 它可以是选中或取消选中。It can be checked or unchecked. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，的设置为。By default, the of a is set to . 默认水平位置是。The default horizontal position of a is . 如果你设置属性通过，堆栈面板的默认值将应用并且该项会居中。If you set the property of a through a , the stack panel's default is applied and the item is centered. 句柄事件，因此，如果附加到事件处理程序，永远不会调用你的处理程序。The handles the event, so if you attach an event handler to , your handler will never be called. 若要添加你自己的处理程序，订阅事件或订阅通过调用与`handledEventsToo`设置为`true`。To add your own handler, subscribe to the event or subscribe to by calling with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## 自定义菜单项控件Customizing the MenuItem Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[菜单样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Menu Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/menu-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建操作中的文本。The following example creates a to manipulate text in a . 包含对象使用， ，和属性和， ，和事件。The contains objects that use the , , and properties and the , , and events. [!code-xaml[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MenuItemCommandsAndEvents#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItemCommandsAndEvents/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ Command { System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::ICommand ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与菜单项关联的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command associated with the menu item.
The command associated with the .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于将命令关联与特定实例。This property is used to associate a command with a particular instance. 下面的示例将**复制**命令并自动提供的输入的笔势文本**Ctrl + C**。The following example associates the **Copy** command with a and automatically supplies the input gesture text **Ctrl+C**. 该示例不会设置属性，但为是在运行时的"复制"。The example does not set the property, but the for the is "Copy" at run time. 你可以指定另一个标头如果你希望不同。You can specify another header for the if you want it to be different. 有关如何将绑定到所需命令的信息，请参阅[命令添加到 MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370)。For information on how to bind to the desired command, see [Add a Command to a MenuItem](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/013d68a0-5373-4a68-bd91-5de574307370). [!code-xaml[MenuItems_snip#MenuItemCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#menuitemcommand)] 引发命令时单击-紧后面事件。A command is raised when a is clicked—just after the event. 根据以下优先级元素上引发的命令：The command is raised on the element according to the following priorities: 1. 如果上设置，则使用该元素。If is set on the , that element is used. 2. 的包含。The of a that contains the . 3. 包含主窗口的焦点目标。The focus target of the main window that contains a . 4. 被单击的 。The that was clicked. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用命令属性以将命令与菜单项相关联。The following examples show how to use the command property to associate commands with menu items. [!code-xaml[MenuEvent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#8)] [!code-csharp[MenuEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#9)]

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 许多控件具有多个不仅仅是文本元素。Many controls have more than just text in the elements. 通常有图标、 复选标记，加速键和箭头以指示子菜单。Often there are icons, check marks, accelerators, and arrows to indicate submenus. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建带有一个图标的菜单项。The following example creates a menu item with an icon. summary.span: 设置文本，以描述将调用与指定项关联的命令的输入笔势。

span.span: Sets the text describing an input gesture that will call the command tied to the specified item.

value.span: 例如描述输入的笔势的文本**Ctrl + C**为**复制**命令。

span.span: The text that describes the input gesture, such as **Ctrl+C** for the **Copy** command.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不将输入的笔势关联与菜单项;只需将文本添加到菜单项。This property does not associate the input gesture with the menu item; it simply adds text to the menu item. 应用程序必须处理用户的输入才能执行操作。The application must handle the user's input to carry out the action. 有关如何将命令与菜单项关联的信息，请参阅。For information on how to associate a command with a menu item, see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用要分配给菜单项的键盘快捷方式文本属性。The following examples show how to use the property to assign keyboard shortcuts text to menu items. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从.NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1，属性具有的受保护的资源库。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, the property has a protected setter. 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向.NET Framework 版本 3.5。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见 [.NET Framework 版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定是否将突出显示菜单项。The following example shows how to determine whether a menu item is highlighted. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否打开 的子菜单。

value.span: 如果打开 的子菜单，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the submenu of the is open; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`，鼠标捕获设置为及其子树。When is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the and its subtree. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何打开一个菜单的子。The following example shows how to open a submenu of a . 在此示例中，调用`fileMenu`包含调用`recentFiles`包含子菜单。In this example, the called `fileMenu` contains a called `recentFiles` that has a submenu. 当`fileMenu`打开时，引发事件和`FileMenu_Opened`事件处理程序将打开的子菜单`recentFiles`。When `fileMenu` is opened, the event is raised and the `FileMenu_Opened` event handler opens the submenu of `recentFiles`. [!code-xaml[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpenMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#issubmenuopenmenu)] [!code-csharp[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#issubmenuopen)] [!code-vb[MenuItems_snip#IsSubMenuOpen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MenuItems_snip/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#issubmenuopen)]

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是很有用，如果你想要创建菜单通过绑定到集合。This property is useful if you want to create a menu by binding to a collection. 项容器是显示集合中的对象的用户界面元素。The item container is the UI element that displays the object in a collection. 如果你想要绑定到集合以创建包含菜单对象和对象，设置属性为 true，创建为每个类型的集合中的对象。If you want to bind to a collection to create a menu that contains objects and objects, set the property to true and create an for each type of object in your collection. 每个必须包含或。Each must contain either a or a . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty UsesItemContainerTemplateProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly UsesItemContainerTemplateProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
